objectives.f_capital: Survive the investigation, protect assets, and discredit the prosecution
objectives.f_law: Build an airtight case against Varo and restore public faith in justice

beats.description: Dawn over Rome. A sweating messenger races through the Forum as grain prices are chalked higher on the boards. We establish the city's anxiety—empty market stalls, thin bread, hungry eyes watching the harbor. Quintus Fabius, stern and purposeful, walks past the crowds toward the courts, observed by unseen watchers.
beats.required_outcome: Establish the grain crisis as backdrop and introduce Quintus as a man of principle walking through a city on edge

beats.description: In Varo's opulent villa, exhausted messengers arrive with shipping reports. Varo studies maps and ledgers with Marcus, his accountant, orchestrating trades before news of delayed grain ships reaches the public markets. Marcus executes the orders with visible unease, understanding they're profiting from Rome's hunger.
beats.required_outcome: Show Varo's ruthless profiteering mechanism and Marcus's complicity, establishing the crime Quintus will investigate

beats.description: Quintus arrives home to find Drusilla reviewing household accounts with unusual intensity. She smoothly conceals certain ledgers as he enters. Their greeting is warm but something passes unsaid between them. She asks about his new investigation; he speaks of justice while she listens with hidden calculation.
beats.required_outcome: Plant seeds of Drusilla's double life and her access to Quintus's legal strategies

beats.description: In the courts, Quintus formally issues a subpoena compelling Marcus to testify about Varo's grain trading. The document bears official seals. Marcus receives it with trembling hands while Varo's agents watch from the gallery. The legal machinery begins to turn.
beats.required_outcome: Quintus successfully subpoenas Marcus, forcing Varo to respond

beats.description: At a private bath house, Varo meets with Marcus. In the steam and shadows, coins change hands. Varo speaks softly of loyalty, of rewards, of what happens to those who betray him. Marcus, sweating from more than the heat, accepts the bribe and commits to silence.
beats.required_outcome: Varo successfully bribes Marcus, but Marcus's conscience is visibly troubled

beats.description: Quintus, acting on initial evidence, moves aggressively. At the Basilica, he announces an asset freeze on Varo's grain holdings. Official seals are affixed to warehouse doors. The crowd gasps at the audacity—no one attacks Varo openly. But the action triggers panic in the markets; prices swing wildly as traders scramble.
beats.required_outcome: Quintus freezes Varo's assets but triggers market instability—SIDE EFFECT: risk_market_crash activates

beats.description: At a public gathering in the Forum, Varo encounters Quintus before the assembled citizens. With cold deliberation, Varo publicly snubs the prosecutor—turning his back mid-greeting, loudly questioning whether 'provincial lawyers' understand Roman commerce. The crowd watches in frozen silence. Quintus, caught off-guard, struggles to respond with dignity.
beats.required_outcome: Varo publicly humiliates Quintus, establishing the personal stakes of their conflict

beats.description: That evening, Drusilla slips away to meet a contact. Using information gleaned from Quintus about the asset freeze, she positions her own hidden investments before the market reacts. Maps and ledgers spread before her, she whispers urgent orders. But she's observed—a senator's aide notes her presence.
beats.required_outcome: Drusilla profits from insider knowledge but is noticed—SIDE EFFECT: risk_senate_inquiry triggered

beats.description: Drusilla attempts to mediate between Varo and her husband through intermediaries, trying to reduce tensions that threaten her double game. She meets Varo privately, urging restraint, positioning herself as a voice of reason. But Varo sees through the attempt—he blames her for divided loyalties and makes veiled threats.
beats.required_outcome: Drusilla's mediation backfires; Varo suspects her—SIDE EFFECT: risk_blamed triggered, she's caught in crossfire

beats.description: Gaius Crassipes, a political fixer and senator, invites Quintus to a private meeting at a secluded garden. Speaking in coded language, he suggests a possible arrangement—Quintus eases the investigation, Varo makes certain concessions. Quintus listens but his face hardens; he refuses any compromise with corruption.
beats.required_outcome: Crassipes fails to broker a deal; Quintus's refusal angers moderates—SIDE EFFECT: risk_base_anger triggered

beats.description: Late at night, a shaken Quintus returns home. Drusilla finds him pacing. With measured calm, she counsels patience—perhaps the investigation moves too fast, perhaps he should consolidate before striking again. Her words are wise, but her motives are mixed. Quintus, seeing only his supportive wife, agrees to slow his approach.
beats.required_outcome: Drusilla successfully manipulates Quintus into slowing the investigation, buying time for her schemes

beats.description: Varo, rattled by the asset freeze and market turmoil, grows paranoid. Marcus attempts to calm him, speaking of patience and legal delays. But Varo, in his agitation, snaps at his accountant—dismissing his counsel and demanding more aggressive action. The relationship frays.
beats.required_outcome: Marcus's advice is rejected; he begins to question his loyalty to Varo

beats.description: In the Forum, Varo's agents spread whispers about Crassipes—crude graffiti appears, rumors of his failed negotiations with the prosecutor paint him as weak and compromised. Street crowds laugh at the senator's expense. Crassipes is mocked as he passes through public spaces.
beats.required_outcome: Varo punishes Crassipes for the failed negotiation, showing his reach and vindictiveness

beats.description: Crassipes, stung by public ridicule, meets privately with Varo. The older senator offers counsel—this scorched-earth approach will unite enemies, patience is required. Varo, seeing political wisdom, reluctantly agrees to temper his public aggression while intensifying covert pressure.
beats.required_outcome: Crassipes successfully counsels Varo toward subtler tactics

beats.description: Quintus, despite Drusilla's counsel, prepares for Marcus's testimony. He visits the accountant personally, speaking of duty to Rome, of immunity for cooperation. Marcus wavers—torn between Varo's gold and his own conscience. He asks for time to decide.
beats.required_outcome: Quintus plants seeds of doubt in Marcus, offering an alternative to Varo's corruption

beats.description: Alone in Varo's archive room, Marcus stares at the incriminating ledgers. He lights a small fire in a brazier. But as he moves to burn the evidence, he hesitates—remembering Quintus's words about Rome, about legacy. At the last moment, he copies key entries onto a wax tablet and hides it, leaving the originals. He hasn't chosen sides yet, but he's created options.
beats.required_outcome: Marcus fails to destroy evidence—instead secretly preserves proof of Varo's crimes

beats.description: Crassipes, working both sides, meets with Marcus. Using the accountant's knowledge, he positions his own grain investments. Exhausted messengers carry his orders. But Crassipes also takes note of Marcus's divided loyalties—useful information for later leverage.
beats.required_outcome: Crassipes profits from Marcus's information while observing his wavering loyalty

beats.description: Drusilla, learning of Marcus's hesitation from her network, takes drastic action. In shadows, with quiet menace, she visits Marcus. She speaks of his family—his aging mother, his sister's children. Nothing explicit, but the threat is clear. Marcus goes pale. Drusilla has shown a darker side.
beats.required_outcome: Drusilla threatens Marcus's family, revealing her willingness to cross moral lines

beats.description: A disturbed Marcus, seeking leverage against all parties, makes a calculated revelation. Meeting secretly with Quintus, he doesn't speak of Varo's crimes—instead he whispers of financial irregularities closer to home. He shows transactions bearing Drusilla's hidden seal. Quintus's world tilts. His wife is entangled with the very forces he fights.
beats.required_outcome: Marcus reveals Drusilla's secret financial dealings to Quintus—the prosecutor's world is shattered

beats.description: Night. Quintus stands alone in his study, Drusilla's hidden ledger in his hands. Footsteps approach—Drusilla enters, seeing him holding the evidence. Their eyes meet. A frozen moment. Neither speaks. The camera holds on their faces: his betrayal, her calculation, the marriage and the investigation both suspended in terrible silence. Outside, Rome burns with unrest over grain prices, unaware that its prosecutor's house is already in flames.
beats.required_outcome: Quintus confronts the evidence of Drusilla's betrayal as she walks in—their marriage and his mission hang in the balance
